title: AMC COBOL
content: We have developed a new feature that integrates AOS and AMC Visual COBOL! The AOS backend will trigger a COBOL service that generates a warranty for a laptop during the purchase process.

title: AMC COBOL
content: COBOL pre-sales users can now attach the Eclipse debugger to demonstrate executing the called COBOL web service.

title: Management Console
content: Admin users can modify the location of the warranty service so they can use on-premise or cloud warranty service.

title: Web
content: When the Enable Warranty setting is ON, you now see a new checkbox (Add Warranty) on the page displaying any laptop.

title: API
content: Added a new API, the COBOL service URL that generates the warranty calculation.
